charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment for a term of 80 months as to each of counts 1,3-8,10,12-14,16 &; 17 concurrently; and 97 months as to counts 18 &; 19, 80 months of which shall run concurrent with all other counts and 17 months of which shall run consecutive to all other counts, for a total term of 97 months; Supervised Release for a term of 3 years to run concurrently on all counts 1, 3-8,10, 12-14,16,17,18 &; 19; Restitution $423,000.00; Assessment $1500.00
